name: Easy hentai puzzle 2
description:
Easy hentai puzzle 2 [/ h2] - This is a logical game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. The pictures that need to be collected depict beautiful girls. Each figure is implemented in 5 stages of the state of clothing. Every two levels, more pieces appear to assemble the puzzle. The game is accompanied by a pleasant soundtrack.

Key features of the game:
 - The game has no censorship!
 - Drawings of girls were drawn specifically for this game!
 - For each puzzle, five game modes (how much the girl will be stripped).
 - Gallery.
 - Achievements!
